creator: JohnSmithWSTester@gmail.com
text:
Action taken after a sampler error - Start next thread loop does not work for bzm - Concurrency Thread Group. 

When sampler fails, JMeter does not start next iteration but goes on.

tested with Java 1.8.0_151

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: This is a 3rd party plugin issue, please contact maintainer.
